name: ghsvs_sass_compile_and_prefix
description: Kompilieren und autoprefixen von scss in Template bs4ghsvs.

scriptsHelp.ghs-npm-update-check: Check for updates for packages in package.json. Prints a list, not more.
scriptsHelp.ghs-ncu-override-json: Check for updates for packages in package.json. AND override package.json file (newest stable versions). Don't forget to run npm install!
scriptsHelp.ghs-watch: Starts a nodemon watcher for changes in scss directory `$npm_package_DIR_scss` that starts a complete, new compilation via `npm run ghs-all` when a scss file is changed. Also starts a complete, new compilation if the watcher is started.
scriptsHelp.ghs-all: Runs a complete job **without FTP upload**: `ghs-rm ghs-mkdir ghs-compile ghs-copy-raw ghs-prefix ghs-minify ghs-produktiv ghs-ftp`
scriptsHelp.ghs-compile: Compiles *.scss files from `$npm_package_DIR_scss` to *.css files in **local** work dir `$npm_package_DIR_work`.
scriptsHelp.ghs-prefix:
Runs Autoprefixer (See file `.browserslistrc`). 
- Source: All *.css files in **local** work dir `$npm_package_DIR_work`. 
- Target: Replaces *.css files in same dir.
scriptsHelp.ghs-produktiv: Runs several npm scripts that match `ghs-produktiv-*`.
scriptsHelp.ghs-produktiv-mkdir: Creates TARGET dirs `$npm_package_DIR_target/$npm_package_DIR_css` and `$npm_package_DIR_target/$npm_package_DIR_raw` and version.txt files (datetime).
scriptsHelp.ghs-produktiv-copy: Copies all prefixed *.css and *.map to  TARGET dir `$npm_package_DIR_target/$npm_package_DIR_css`.
scriptsHelp.ghs-produktiv-copyRaw: Copies all NON-prefixed *.css and *.map to TARGET dir `$npm_package_DIR_target/$npm_package_DIR_raw`.
scriptsHelp.ghs-ftp: Runs several npm scripts that match `ghs-ftp-*`. to **prepare** **locally** the upload of files via FTP. **Runs no FTP upload.**
scriptsHelp.ghs-ftp-mkdir: Creates local dirs `$npm_package_DIR_work/$npm_package_DIR_ftp/$npm_package_DIR_css` and `$npm_package_DIR_work/$npm_package_DIR_ftp/$npm_package_DIR_raw` and subfolders with `version.txt` files (datetime).
scriptsHelp.ghs-ftp-copy: Copies all prefixed *.css and *.map to local `$npm_package_DIR_work/$npm_package_DIR_ftp/$npm_package_DIR_css`.
scriptsHelp.ghs-ftp-copyRaw: Copies all NON-prefixed *.css and *.map to local `$npm_package_DIR_work/$npm_package_DIR_ftp/$npm_package_DIR_raw`.
scriptsHelp.ghs-upload: Runs the upload of all files/dirs via FTP inside dir `$npm_package_DIR_work/$npm_package_DIR_ftp`. NEEDS A CORRECTLY CONFIGURED ftp-credentials.json! Check twice and test before using it.

author: G@HService Berlin Neukölln, Volkmar Volli Schlothauer (ghsvs.de)
contributors: G@HService Berlin Neukölln, Volkmar Volli Schlothauer (ghsvs.de)

scripts.ghs-all: npm-run-all ghs-rm ghs-mkdir ghs-compile ghs-copy-raw ghs-prefix ghs-minify ghs-produktiv ghs-ftp
